name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BNTP: Bookmarks in New Tab Page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight New Tab Page with Bookmarks and Top Sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Less is more.

* Simple
* Lightweight
* No ads
* No tracking

Features:

* List bookmarks by folders
* Collapse a folder
* Move a bookmark by Drag and Drop
* Edit a bookmark
* Automatic dark mode
* Sync the preferences (theme or folder collapse)

It will request the following permissions:

* Show bookmarks
* Show recently visited sites
* Show favicon
* Store preferences to storage

This is an open source software.
https://github.com/int128/bntp
